Auto-generated from all feature plans. Last updated: 2025-11-25

## Active Technologies
- C# / .NET 6.0 or later + Microsoft.TeamFoundationServer.Client, Microsoft.VisualStudio.Services.Client, System.Windows (WPF) (001-tfs-viewer)
- Local application settings for TFS server URL (user preferences); no database required (001-tfs-viewer)
- C# / .NET 10.0 + WPF, MaterialDesignThemes 5.1.0, CommunityToolkit.Mvvm 8.3.2, Microsoft.TeamFoundationServer.Client 19.250.0-preview, Microsoft.VisualStudio.Services.Client 19.250.0-preview (001-tfs-viewer)
- System.Runtime.Caching (in-memory cache for TFS data), local file for logging (001-tfs-viewer)

- C# 10+ with .NET 6 or .NET 8 LTS + WPF, Microsoft.TeamFoundationServer.Client, MaterialDesignInXamlToolkit, CommunityToolkit.Mvvm, Hardcodet.NotifyIcon.Wpf (001-tfs-viewer)
